content.description: Across from beautiful Huntington Beach, find this not-so-secret speakeasy tucked inside its parent restaurant, Bluegold. But the difference is palpableâ€”LSXO is a bit cooler, louder and has a more defined personality. A trio of house-made condiments tops each table, with umami-rich fish sauce in place of salt, spice-infused oil ...
content.name: LSXO
